title: Fight
description: Fight is the exciting and breathtaking continuation of Struggle. In Fight, life is looking good for Nathan , with the love of life, Eva his life. Things are finally getting back on track, but his nemesis, Peter, doesn't want it to stay this way and has plans to make Nathan's life very difficult. Eva finally realizes that she can trust someone in her life, but her manipulative mother has other plans and throws obstacles in her way. And we have Mason, who wants to be Nathan's friend again at any cost. With Eva's mother and Peter against him, Nathan has very little to rely on. What will happen? What obstacles life will throw at him? Will Eva get what she wants? Find out the answers in this exciting read.
author: P.A.   Jones
